name: ScheduleSupportingData
title: Schedule Supporting Data
description: This resource consolidates various mapping and conflict information related to vaccine scheduling to support decision-making processes.

element.short: Schedule Supporting Data
element.definition: This resource consolidates various mapping and conflict information related to vaccine scheduling to support decision-making processes.

element.short: Potential conflicts between live virus vaccines based on previous and current vaccinations and the required time intervals to avoid interference.
element.definition: Potential conflicts between live virus vaccines based on previous and current vaccinations and the required time intervals to avoid interference.

element.short: Details about the previous vaccination.
element.definition: Details about the previous vaccination.

element.short: Type of the previous vaccine.
element.definition: Type of the previous vaccine.

element.short: CVX code for the previous vaccine.
element.definition: CVX code for the previous vaccine.

element.short: Details about the current vaccination.
element.definition: Details about the current vaccination.

element.short: Type of the current vaccine.
element.definition: Type of the current vaccine.

element.short: CVX code for the current vaccine.
element.definition: CVX code for the current vaccine.

element.short: Time interval before which a conflict begins after the previous vaccination.
element.definition: Time interval before which a conflict begins after the previous vaccination.

element.short: Minimum time interval after which the conflict might end.
element.definition: Minimum time interval after which the conflict might end.

element.short: Time interval after which the conflict ends.
element.definition: Time interval after which the conflict ends.

element.short: Mapping of vaccine groups to their specific attributes.
element.definition: Mapping of vaccine groups to their specific attributes.

element.short: Name of the vaccine group.
element.definition: Name of the vaccine group.

element.short: Flag to indicate if the full vaccine group should be administered.
element.definition: Flag to indicate if the full vaccine group should be administered.

element.short: Mapping of vaccine groups to their associated antigens.
element.definition: Mapping of vaccine groups to their associated antigens.

element.short: The name of the vaccine group.
element.definition: The name of the vaccine group.

element.short: List of antigens associated with the vaccine group.
element.definition: List of antigens associated with the vaccine group.

element.short: Maps CVX Codes to Antigens and Ages.
element.definition: Maps CVX Codes to Antigens and Ages.

element.short: CVX Code
element.definition: CVX Code

element.short: Short Description of this CVX
element.definition: Short Description of this CVX

element.short: A list of associated antigens and ages.
element.definition: A list of associated antigens and ages.

element.short: Name of the antigen
element.definition: Name of the antigen

element.short: Starting age, if applicable, when this antigen is associated with this CVX code
element.definition: Starting age, if applicable, when this antigen is associated with this CVX code

element.short: Ending age, if applicable, when this antigen is associated with this CVX code
element.definition: Ending age, if applicable, when this antigen is associated with this CVX code

element.short: Describes the observation rules for vaccination based on specific patient conditions.
element.definition: Describes the observation rules for vaccination based on specific patient conditions.

element.short: Unique code for the observation.
element.definition: Unique code for the observation.

element.short: Title of the observation.
element.definition: Title of the observation.

element.short: Text indicating why the vaccine should be administered.
element.definition: Text indicating why the vaccine should be administered.

element.short: Text indicating why the vaccine should not be administered.
element.definition: Text indicating why the vaccine should not be administered.

element.short: Additional clarifications for the vaccination rule.
element.definition: Additional clarifications for the vaccination rule.

element.short: List of associated SNOMED or other coded values relevant to the observation.
element.definition: List of associated SNOMED or other coded values relevant to the observation.

element.short: Code identifying the condition or observation.
element.definition: Code identifying the condition or observation.

element.short: The system in which the code is valid (e.g., SNOMED, CDCPHINVS).
element.definition: The system in which the code is valid (e.g., SNOMED, CDCPHINVS).

element.short: Human-readable name or description of the code.
element.definition: Human-readable name or description of the code.
